issue.title: [C++] Document available functions in compute::FunctionRegistry
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8989](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8989). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create a compute page in the C++ section of the Sphinx docs and make a list of the available functions and what they do
